name: Michael Clarence Bender
fullAddress: 400 block S 65th St Tacoma WA 98408 Pierce
circumstances: A man was crawling on the lawn outside a burning Tacoma house with a rifle in his hand as firefighters battled the flames. Neighbors called 911 with concerns about the man. Witnesses said he appeared to be drunk as he started walking down Pacific Avenue. Police arrived about 10:45 p.m. and ordered the man to put down his gun. He allegedly refused. They exchanged gunfire, and the man was killed.
Description: 1/7/2018: A man was crawling on the lawn outside a burning Tacoma house with a rifle in his hand as firefighters battled the flames. Neighbors called 911 with concerns about the man. They exchanged gunfire, and the man was killed. http://www.thenewstribune.com/news/local/crime/article193488139.html

name: Henry Michael Carden
fullAddress: 5100 block 200th St E Spanaway WA 98387 Pierce
circumstances: Deputies were called about 11:25 p.m. to a home for a home invasion. Deputy Daniel A. McCartney, 34, was fatally shot while chasing two burglars. One of the alleged burglars, Henry Carden, was killed. The other was caught later.

name: Juan Valencia
fullAddress: 808 Valley Ave NW Puyallup WA 98371 Pierce
agency: Puyallup Police Department, Milton Police Department
circumstances: Police got a report of a recklessly driven vehicle. Police said the van was swerving into oncoming traffic and stopping in the middle of the road at 3:39 p.m. At 3:52 p.m., officers found the van had been parked in the middle of Valley Avenue NW near the Puyallup Recreation Center. Police found the man behind the rec center. Seven officers葉wo from Milton and five from Puyallup葉ried to negotiate with the man, but he fired at least one other shot, and officers shot and killed him.
Description: 1/12/2018: Police got a report of a recklessly driven vehicle. Police said the van was swerving into oncoming traffic and stopping in the middle of the road at 3:39 p.m. At 3:52 p.m., officers found the van had been parked in the middle of Valley Avenue NW near the Puyallup Recreation Center. Police found the man behind the rec center. Seven officers葉wo from Milton and five from Puyallup葉ried to negotiate with the man, but he fired at least one other shot, and officers shot and killed him. http://komonews.com/news/local/valley-avenue-shut-down-after-officer-involved-shooting-in-puyallup

name: Ilkka Olavi Hiironen
fullAddress: 51st Avenue Southeast and 20th Street Southeast Everett WA 98201 Snohomish
circumstances: Deputies confronted a 35-year-old man who had been reported as suicidal by his wife at about 8 p.m. The man had called his wife to say he wanted police to kill him but did not say where he was. At about 9 p.m., deputies found the man's vehicle. Police said the man came out holding what looked like a weapon, and deputies shot and killed him.
Description: 1/21/2018: Deputies confronted a 35-year-old man who had been reported as suicidal by his wife at about 8 p.m. The man had called his wife to say he wanted police to kill him but did not say where he was. Police said the man came out holding what looked like a weapon, and deputies shot and killed him. http://komonews.com/news/local/snohomish-county-deputy-involved-in-shooting-near-everett

name: Vaneesa L. Hopson
fullAddress: 1200 block Fern Street Southwest Olympia WA 98502 Thurston
circumstances: Vaneesa L. Hopson was injected with a drug to calm her, but she died.

name: Jason Seavers
fullAddress: 26th Ave NE & NE 55th St Seattle WA 98105 King
circumstances: Police responded around 4:20 a.m. for the report of someone breaking into vehicles. When officers arrived, the suspect fled from inside the vehicle, and police gave chase. During the pursuit, the suspect allegedly fired a shot at officers. Someone nearby called about a man breaking into a home and stealing a vehicle at gunpoint. A man was in the stolen vehicle when he crashed. He was shot and killed.
Description: 2/19/2018: Police responded around 4:20 a.m. for the report of someone breaking into vehicles. When officers arrived, the suspect fled from inside the vehicle, and police gave chase. name: William Langfitt
address: 252nd St E and Mountain Highway E
fullAddress: 252nd St E and Mountain Highway E Graham WA 98387 Pierce
circumstances: A Pierce County deputy shot and killed William Langfitt after he reportedly tried to get into the deputy's patrol car. Earlier 911 callers said the man was having a breakdown, was armed with a knife and was trying to get into people's vehicles, police said.
Description: 3/16/2018: A Pierce County deputy shot and killed William Langfitt after he reportedly tried to get into the deputy's patrol car. name: Mitchell Nelson
fullAddress: 28100 block 28th Avenue S Federal Way WA 98003  King
circumstances: Police said two people, a man and a woman, ran from a hit-and-run collision before noon. The woman was taken into custody, but the man broke into a house nearby. Hours later, police entered the house and found the suspect in a crawlspace. Police said there was an exchange of gunfire, and Mitchell Nelson was killed.
